resources.string: You are not allowed to go back at this stage !
Congratulations! You have been successfully registered.
Sorry! You need to pay the fees first to move ahead and register successfully.

PASSWORD POLICY: 
				⭐At least 8 chars 
				⭐Contains at least one digit 
				⭐Contains at least one lower alpha char and one 
						 upper alpha char 
				⭐Contains at least one char within a set of
						 special chars (@#%$^ etc.) 
				⭐Does not contain space, tab, etc.

string.name: policy_expand
string.u: To know more about the password policy click here
